en: You don't have a pickaxe to mine! Buy one from the shop.
fr: Tu n'as pas de pioche pour miner! Achètes-une dans la boutique.
it: Non hai un piccone per minare! Comprarlo nel negozio.

fr: Clic droit pour terminer la construction
it: Clic destro per smettere di costruire

en: View the galaxy this system is in
fr: Voir la galaxie contenant ce système
it: Visualizzare la galassia contenendo questo sistema

en: View the cluster this galaxy is in
View the supercluster this cluster is in
fr: Voir le superamas contenant cet amas
it: Vlisualizzare il superammasso contenendo questo ammasso

en: View the universe this supercluster is in
View discovered universes in this dimension
fr: Voir les univers découverts dans cette dimension
it: Visualizzare gli universi scoperti in questa dimensione

fr:

it:

en: Materials are required to do various tasks in the game, including crafting, space agriculture and resource conversion.
fr: Les matériaux sont utilisés partout: fabrication, agriculture spatiale, conversion de ressources etc.
it: Si servono materiali per varie cose: fabbricazione, agricoltura spaziale, conversione delle risorse ecc.

en: Speed-up items instantly accelerate construction of a building.
fr: Les speed-ups accélèrent la construction d'un bâtiment.
it: I speed-up accelerano la costruzione di un edificio.

en: Overclock items temporarily boost resource production of the affected buildings.
fr: Les overclocks accélèrent la production des ressources d'un bâtiment pendant un certain temps.
it: I overclock accelerano temporaneamente la produzione delle risorse di un edificio.

en: Pickaxes allow you to mine a planet for various resources.
fr: Les pioches permettent de miner une planète pour des ressources.
it: I picconi ti permettono di minare un pianeta per varie risorse.
